contents.text: Thank you for calling Civil Maps in San Francisco, powering autonomous vehicles with real-time 3D cognition for safer, smarter mobility.
For technical support and service inquiries, press '1'.
For integration support and mapping software assistance, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve an integration error in the 3D mapping software that’s delaying my development timeline.
Troubleshoot an integration error with the Civil Maps 3D SDK in my autonomous vehicle project.
I need to troubleshoot a point-cloud registration error in the Civil Maps SDK.
I need assistance installing and integrating the Civil Maps software into my vehicle’s navigation system.
Troubleshoot integration of the Civil Maps 3D mapping SDK in my autonomous vehicle research.

contents.text: For billing, invoicing, and account management, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review and correct a billing discrepancy on my latest invoice and update my payment details.
Review and update my billing details and clarify charges on this month's Civil Maps invoice.
I want a detailed invoice breakdown for last month’s mapping API usage.
I’d like someone to review my recent invoice and help me set up a payment plan.
Clarify an unexpected charge and request an invoice for my student account.

contents.text: For sales, demos, and general information, press '2'.
For detailed product information and pricing, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed product specifications and volume pricing for our planned deployment.
Obtain detailed feature breakdown and pricing for an enterprise 3D mapping license.
I need specifications and pricing for the enterprise tier of your 3D cognition SDK.
I want detailed information on features and pricing for your 3D mapping solution.
Get detailed academic pricing and feature specs for the 3D cognition platform.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized demo of our 3D mapping platform, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo scheduling specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized demo of the 3D mapping platform for my operations team next week.
Schedule a personalized demo of the 3D mapping platform for evaluation with military vehicles.
I want to schedule a hands-on demo of your LiDAR-based 3D mapping platform.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of your mapping platform at a time I can attend.
Schedule a personalized demo of the Civil Maps mapping system for my university research group.
